events.name: Hackathon sobre Big Data & Hadoop y sobre Social APIs and Web UI
events.about:
Globant invites you to a Hackathon on Hadoop & Big Data and Social APIs and WebUI.

During the event new knowledge, you will have the opportunity to put into practice, to network and take prizes. You can participate in one or both hackathons at your convenience.

The world is always changing and the new challenge is to extract information buriedbetween these huge volumes of data, only those who invest in social network analysisand get to know the audience will benefit from the real value of this era.

During the hackathon will experience a close several of these tools to carry out thistype of analysis.

This lets you know hackathon in your developments using technologies that are here to stay: Google maps, Facebook, Flickr and Twitter, among other

More info at:http://communications.globant.com/Comm/Events/ext/2012/HackathonColombia/
